description.raw:
There are ignition fuel tools headers used in [gazebo/common/FuelModelDatabase.hh](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/918afe71c8e849e36bec7e1c16dee6f6053b1ba2/gazebo/common/FuelModelDatabase.hh?at=config_find_ign_fuel&fileviewer=file-view-default#FuelModelDatabase.hh-25), but fuel tools isn't yet exported as a dependency in cmake and pkgconfig. Now that the homebrew builds have fuel tools installed as a dependency, the examples and pkgconfig compilation tests are failing:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/289/testReport/

This should fix it without affecting the linux builds that don't have fuel tools yet.
description.html:
There are ignition fuel tools headers used in gazebo/common/FuelModelDatabase.hh, but fuel tools isn't yet exported as a dependency in cmake and pkgconfig. Now that the homebrew builds have fuel tools installed as a dependency, the examples and pkgconfig compilation tests are failing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/289/testReport/

This should fix it without affecting the linux builds that don't have fuel tools yet.

title.raw: Export dependency on ignition-fuel-tools if found
